summary:
We are a small AI development team that builds software solutions to help businesses work more efficiently. We focus on creating tools that can understand and process text, automate repetitive tasks, and provide intelligent responses to user questions.

Our main expertise is in building chatbots, document processing systems, and knowledge management tools. We work with modern AI technologies to create applications that can read documents, answer questions about your business data, and help streamline workflows.

We believe in creating practical solutions that solve real business problems. Whether you need to automate customer support, process large amounts of documents, or build a system that can answer questions about your company knowledge, we focus on delivering tools that actually work and provide value.

members.name: Antonio
members.bio: Meet Antonio, an AI Team Lead who transforms complex technical challenges into breakthrough solutions. With a unique blend of academic rigor and industry expertise, he bridges the gap between cutting-edge AI research and practical business applications. His journey from computer science professor to AI leader has equipped him with exceptional communication skills and a talent for mentoring teams to achieve extraordinary results.
expertise: AI strategy and team leadership with proven track record
Advanced machine learning with TensorFlow, PyTorch, and scikit-learn
NLP mastery using NLTK, spaCy, and Hugging Face ecosystem
RAG architecture design with LlamaIndex and LangChain
Full-stack development from Python backends to React frontends
Cloud deployment expertise on AWS and Azure platforms
Data science and visualization with Pandas, NumPy, and Matplotlib
highlights: Former computer science professor with strong mentoring abilities
Specializes in translating business needs into AI solutions
Expert in building and leading high-performing AI teams
Passionate about making AI accessible and practical for businesses
specialties: Academic research translation to practical applications

projects.name: Enterprise AI Strategy Implementation
projects.description: Led comprehensive AI transformation initiatives for multiple organizations, designing strategic roadmaps and mentoring development teams to achieve measurable business outcomes.

projects.name: RAG System Architecture
projects.description: Designed and implemented advanced Retrieval-Augmented Generation systems using LlamaIndex and LangChain for enterprise knowledge management and intelligent document processing.

projects.name: ML Platform Development
projects.description: Built scalable machine learning platforms combining traditional ML with modern LLM capabilities, enabling rapid deployment and monitoring of AI models in production environments.

members.name: Saša
members.bio: Saša is a dynamic Junior AI Engineer who brings fresh energy and innovative thinking to every project. Specializing in NLP and intelligent automation, he has a talent for creating AI solutions that genuinely improve how people work. His diverse skill set spans from advanced AI frameworks to creative design, making him uniquely capable of building both powerful and user-friendly applications.
members.education: Self-taught with extensive hands-on project experience
expertise: Advanced NLP and document processing automation
Interactive AI application development with Streamlit
Modern Python development with Poetry and best practices
Full-stack web development from Angular frontends to Python APIs
Creative design and user experience optimization
Vector database implementation for semantic search
highlights: Rapid learner with strong self-directed development skills
Combines technical expertise with creative design sensibilities
Specializes in user-friendly AI application development
Proven track record in document processing and automation
specialties: Developing data extraction and automation tools

projects.name: Resume Extractor Application
projects.description: Developing a resume extractor application that leverages advanced NLP and AI technologies to streamline recruitment. Uses LangChain framework to analyze and extract key information from resumes in various formats (PDF, DOCX), providing structured JSON output.

projects.name: Overwatch 2 Character Chatbot
projects.description: Developed a chatbot providing in-depth, fact-based insights on Overwatch 2 characters. Integrates Streamlit, LlamaIndex, and OpenAI's GPT models with web scraping, embeddings, and semantic chunking for accurate responses.

projects.name: Gaming Strategy Chatbot
projects.description: Built a LangChain-powered chatbot using FAISS vector databases and YouTube video transcripts for real-time insights from Overwatch 2 coaching videos, focusing on gameplay strategies.
